title: Student-Led Discussion Strategies for Metacognitive Enhancement in Online Science Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Science curriculum knowledge and basic proficiency in online learning platform utilization
context.additional_context: Science education methodology training program for pre-service/in-service teachers.

learning_goals: Learners can generate and share at least three metacognitive questions (knowledge, monitoring, regulation) in online discussions with peers.
Learners can reflect on their thinking processes during discussions and reorganize learning content by applying at least two metacognitive strategies.
Learners can analyze peers' discussion participation patterns and provide at least one instance of metacognitive feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
